title: So well, need help with the honor system.
body:
Ok so, I got banned for toxicity (yeah, seems like it's time to disable whole chat cuz I can't stand toxics, just in my defence :^) ).

So, how about the skin for getting to gold tier? If I will bring back my honor level to at least 2nd, will I be able to get the skin?

replies.body: We recently posted the 2017 Ranked Rewards Eligibility FAQ that goes over all the stipulations on getting those rewards. It looks like anyone who had a ban of 7 days or more after 8/22 will not be eligible, so you most likely won't be getting them.
